bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
There is raw markdown in the docs. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
https://streamlit.io/docs/getting_started.html#write-a-data-frame
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
A code snippet should be rendered. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Raw markdown <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1080714/66380964-4e60e680-e9b0-11e9-8420-a0be576f7492.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
Not sure <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.47 Python version: n.a. Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? OS version: Mac OS 10.14.6 Browser version: Safari 12.1.2
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
N.a.

comments.comment: I can see it is fixed on the latest build. Sorry for the noise.
